name: Senjakala Berhala
description:
This work was done in 2017 which tells about environmental damage caused by human treatment of the surrounding environment. 
The skull that is shown is a symbol of the destruction of the structure of the ecosystem of living things themselves. Life is always coupled with dualism which lays out the definition of balance to whatever we interpret as part of life.

Basic work using Chinese ink on paper and then working through digital media.
Infinite Loop Animation
